Title: PortableDI - Portable Lightweight Dependency Injection
Description: PortableDI is a very lightweight dependency injection container build to be portable to all common windows platforms like WinRT, Win8, WP7, WP8 and XBox.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
 

PortableDI is a very lightweight dependency injector built to be portable to windows platforms like WinRT, Win8(.1), WP7, WP8(.1) and XBox.

Main Goal

While writing portable code the choosen platform subset often misses implementations that are essential for your code to work. PortableDI offers a simple way to inject your own implementations for different target platforms, while keeping your portable code clean and transparent.

Highlights

  • Portable: Get it - use it - PortableDI supports Windows, WinRT, Win8, Win8.1 WP7, WP8, WP8.1, XBox, Xamarin.iOS and Xamarin.Android
  • Fluent syntax: With the fluent syntax the registration of dependencies is a piece of cake.
  • Easy to use: You just need to know two essential methods, Bind() and Resolve() - Thats it!

Usage

Standard Dependency Injection

Register a class to be resolved for the user, where the user knows only an interface:

DIContainer.Bind<IKnownInterface>()
  .To<HiddenImplementation>();

Resolve/get an instance of a known type:

var instance = DIContainer.Resolve<IKnownInterface>(); // returns an instance of type HiddenImplementation


See the full Documentation to get all the details!
